Uses of Package
org.apache.solr.morphlines.solr

  • Classes in org.apache.solr.morphlines.solr used by org.apache.solr.morphlines.solr 
    Class and Description
    DocumentLoader
    A vehicle to load a list of Solr documents into some kind of destination, such as a SolrServer or MapReduce RecordWriter.
    SolrClientDocumentLoader
    A vehicle to load a list of Solr documents into a local or remote SolrClient.
    SolrMorphlineContext
    A context that is specific to Solr.
    SolrMorphlineContext.Builder
    Helper to construct a SolrMorphlineContext instance.
